REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0845 reute b f BC-BANK-OF-FRANCE-LEAVES 04-02 0078

TEXT.TITLE: BANK OF FRANCE LEAVES INTERVENTION RATE UNCHANGED
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of France said it left its intervention rate unchanged at 7-3/4 pct when it injected funds to the market against first category paper in todays money market intervention tender. Money market dealers had earlier expressed mixed views on a possible quarter point cut. The rate was last adjusted on March 9, when it was reduced to 7-3/4 pct from the eight pct rate set in January. REUTER
